meanings.definition: The act of making something more accessible or appealing to the general public.
meanings.sent1: The popularizations of science documentaries have sparked interest in many people.
meanings.sent2: The popularizations of classic literature have made it easier for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The popularizations of cooking shows have turned even the most reluctant chefs into kitchen enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The popularizations of history through storytelling are like opening a door to the past.
meanings.sent5: The popularizations of art have transformed galleries into bustling hubs of creativity.

meanings.definition: Something that has been simplified or made more widely known for the general public.
meanings.sent1: The popularizations of complex scientific concepts help students grasp difficult ideas.
meanings.sent2: The popularizations of health tips in magazines reach a broad audience.
meanings.sent3: The popularizations of fashion trends make shopping more exciting for many.
meanings.sent4: The popularizations of technology have brought the world closer together.
meanings.sent5: The popularizations of self-help books offer practical advice for daily life.
